record.description: Burton-Judson Courts Quadrangle. Court of the men's new residence halls south of the midway.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: The third copy is torn in places and has orange crayon marks on the surface. However, the remaining copies are in good condition. Copyright stamp
